memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int n, const float *x, rocblas_int incx, const float *y, rocblas_int incy, float *result)
memberdef.name: rocblas_sdot

detaileddescription.para: dot(u) perform dot product of vector x and y result = x * y;
dotc perform dot product of complex vector x and complex y result = conjugate (x) * y;

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of y.
store the dot product. either on the host CPU or device GPU. return is 0.0 if n <= 0.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int n, const double *x, rocblas_int incx, const double *y, rocblas_int incy, double *result)
memberdef.name: rocblas_ddot
